trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> objects.
Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection:
The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A> method adds a single installer to the collection.
The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> methods add multiple installers to the collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A> method and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> property, which is the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index.
Remove installers through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A> method.
Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.

The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, calls their <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> classes.
Adds the specified installer to this collection of installers.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to specify the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to add to the collection.
The zero-based index of the added installer.
Adds the specified array of installers to this collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
An array of type <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
Adds the specified collection of installers to this collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
Determines whether the specified installer is included in collection.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to look for.
`true` if the specified installer is in this collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the items from the collection to an array, begining at the specified index.
The array to copy to.
The index of the array at which to paste the collection.
Determines the index of a specified installer in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to locate in the collection.
The zero-based index of the installer in the collection.
Inserts the specified installer into the collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which to insert the installer.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets an installer at the specified index.

When the specified <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> that contains the collection.
The zero-based index of the installer to get or set.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer at the specified index.
Performs additional custom processes before a new installer is inserted into the collection.
The zero-based index at which to insert value.
The new value of the installer at index.
Performs additional custom processes before an installer is removed from the collection.
The zero-based index at which value can be found.
The installer to be removed from index.
Performs additional custom processes before an existing installer is set to a new value.
The zero-based index at which to replace oldValue.
The value to replace with newValue.
The new value of the installer at index.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the removed <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to `null`.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to remove.
